ResourceHeader.Description: Lyford (LYFD) Magnetometer Station is located in Lyford, Texas, USA.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Lyford fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Lyford High School.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Lyford Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Lyford Ground Magnetometer Station
